text: The women's 4 × 182 metres relay event at the 1968 European Indoor Games was held on 10 March in Madrid. Each athlete ran one lap of the 182 metres track. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center; font- size:95%" |- !Rank !Nation !Competitors !Time !Notes |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Renate Meyer Hannelore Trabert Christa Elsler Erika Rost || 1:28.8 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Liliya Tkachenko Lyudmila Samotyosova Vera Popkova Natalya Chistyakova || || |} ==References== Category:4 × 400 metres relay at the European Athletics Indoor Championships Relay
title: 1968 European Indoor Games – Women's 4 × 182 metres relay
